product_name: Bed HeadAfter Party Super Smoothing Cream
summary: SummaryThe Bed Head After Party Smoothing Cream is the ultimate anti frizz hair product for silky, smooth, shiny, healthy-looking hair! This lightweight hair smoothing cream helps prevent static build up, flyaways and frizz for smooth locks. The shiny hair product also imparts incredible shine and gloss.
details: DetailsFeaturesProfessional hair smoothing cream for silky, smooth, shiny and healthy looking hairUse on both dry and damp hair, then either blow dry or leave to air dry to boost shineGreat for frizzy hair, dull hair and coarse hair of any lengthKey IngredientsAnti-Frizz Complex that smooths frizz and absorbs moisture from the air to defend against the style-shocking effects of humidityShine Enhancer to boost hair shine and Castor Seed Oil to help hair reflect shine more evenlyScent TypeEnchanting Summer Fruit fragranceItem 2576162How To UseEasy to use, even without the need for heat or styling. After Party can be used to finish your look by applying a small amount through dry hair. It can also be used on damp hair and left to air dry for super effortless style. Work a small amount between palms of hands and smooth onto damp or dry hair. Brush through for even distribution. Either leave hair to air dry or blow dry hair.Pre-caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse with water.IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Dimethicone, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethiconol, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Phenyl Trimethicone, Propylene Glycol, Isohexadecane, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), PEG-8 Methicone, Ethylhexyl Hydroxystearate, Polysorbate 80, Sorbitan Oleate, PEG-4 Dilaurate, PEG-4 Laurate, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, PEG-4, Sodium PCA, Dimethicone PEG-8 Meadowfoamate, Panthenol, Cinnamidopropyltrimonium Chloride, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool, Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Mica (CI 77019), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).
how_to_use: Easy to use, even without the need for heat or styling. After Party can be used to finish your look by applying a small amount through dry hair. It can also be used on damp hair and left to air dry for super effortless style. Work a small amount between palms of hands and smooth onto damp or dry hair. Brush through for even distribution. Either leave hair to air dry or blow dry hair.Pre-caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse with water.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: Listen I absolutely love this product. Mine came broke so I did have to return it. I have never had that happen before so just a fluke. I bought it while it was on sale because I needed to add to my order for free shipping. I'm just being honest. So I only returned it because I already have some so I really didn't need a new one right now. I do always keep this product in my home. As a licensed cosmetologist this is a really great product. I always use it to smooth the hair and flyaways after styling. It works nicely if the hairspray you use is just a little to stiff and you want to smooth it without damaging the style you created. Bed head products also smell great. I use bed head masterpiece hairspray.

reviews.headline: Go-To Smoothing Cream
reviews.comments: I have used Bed Head After Party Super Smoothing Cream for years. I also like to pair it with Bed Head Straighten Out (for good humidity protection). I have tried many products when styling my wavy to curly hair, straight; this product is a go-to product that does deliver, especially in combination with Straighten-Out. I will be honest that I have never found a product that is my absolute favorite smoothing or straightening product; they all have their flaws, but this does a good job at a decent price point and I find myself unable to eliminate from my styling concoction. I know you curly-girls who straighten your hair feel the pain of finding the perfect product, too. This is worth a try for you.

faceoff_positive.comments: My hair is, as I'd like to say one of a kind type of hair. It's long, semi-thick, curly, (looser curls), frizz is out of control, it's a perfect mix of a impossible hair. This was only my 2nd product I've tried by Bed Head, the After Party, and I'm in love! Even on less humid days, my hair is still frizzy, always. Since using this my frizz is down by more than half. I absolutely love the brightly colored bottle, lid is kind of oddly shaped. Easy to grasp, and hold while spraying onto my hair. I've use both with damp and dry hair, and the results we're equally just as great. I've been able to straighten my hair, while keeping my frizz lower. It makes my hair smell so good, I've gotten compliments. Not only on the smell, but also on some of my styles with it. People close notice the frizz is way lower, which I always dreaded. It's more shiny, less frizzy, feels more healthy. This cream isn't greasy, it doesn't weigh my hair down or feel scrunchy and hard. Plus it's good for all hair types. Now I'm excited to try more products from Bed Head, it's just what I needed and perfect timing. I've already recommended and will continue to do so.
faceoff_positive.headline: Bed Head After Party!!

faceoff_negative.comments: My hair type is fine and a mix of 2A-C and bits of 3A (on a good day, haha). It's been about a year since I've discovered this about my hair so I'm always game for trying new products in general, but especially for controlling frizz. I was happy to receive this product, hoping it might solve my frizz problem. Sadly, it did not. Since my hair is more on the fine side I cannot use too much product without risking weighing my waves and curls down. If my hair was all flat, I wouldn't care. So even when using this product, my hair still ends up frizzy. Maybe it's because I'm not using "enough" but you would think that using the two pumps on damp hair would be enough—I use a microfiber towel for goodness sakes! I also don't blow dry/diffuse my hair because it doesn't work for me, so I didn't bother doing that when testing out the product (and based on some other reviews, blow drying doesn't make much of a difference anyway). I was hoping to love or just like this product, but I don't. I might give this product to a friend with hair that can handle it. I don't give it one star simply because I did enjoy the scent a lot.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not good for fine wavy/curly hair
